docs.snippet: Like many Western Hemisphere nations, Colombia has had a strong start to the Cup. Expect Juan Cuadrado to send in dangerous crosses that bother Japan’s defense.
docs.abstract: Like many Western Hemisphere nations, Colombia has had a strong start to the Cup. Expect Juan Cuadrado to send in dangerous crosses that bother Japan’s defense.

headline.main: Columbia vs. Japan: World Cup 2014 Live Blog

docs.snippet: Italy coach Cesare Prandelli says he is resigning after his team was eliminated from the World Cup following a 1-0 defeat to Uruguay.
docs.lead_paragraph: Italy coach Cesare Prandelli says he is resigning after his team was eliminated from the World Cup following a 1-0 defeat to Uruguay.

headline.main: Prandelli Quits as Coach After Italy's Exit
headline.print_headline: Prandelli Quits as Coach After Italy's Exit

docs.snippet: England's young side gave their fans something to cheer before exiting Brazil with a promising performance in their World Cup 0-0 draw with Group D winners Costa Rica, according to manager Roy Hodgson.
docs.lead_paragraph: England's young side gave their fans something to cheer before exiting Brazil with a promising performance in their World Cup 0-0 draw with Group D winners Costa Rica, according to manager Roy Hodgson.

headline.main: Hodgson Happy With Improved England Performance
headline.print_headline: Hodgson Happy With Improved England Performance

docs.snippet: A group has taken steps to become the first officially recognized marijuana-growing club in Uruguay, where lawmakers have made their country the world's first national marketplace for legal pot.
docs.lead_paragraph: A group has taken steps to become the first officially recognized marijuana-growing club in Uruguay, where lawmakers have made their country the world's first national marketplace for legal pot.

headline.main: Uruguay's First Marijuana Club Seeks Recognition
headline.print_headline: Uruguay's First Marijuana Club Seeks Recognition

docs.snippet: Underscoring a power shift away from Europe, Uruguay fought — and apparently even bit — its way to a 1-0 victory over Italy Tuesday to move to the World Cup's next round with Costa Rica, which sent England home without a single victory...
docs.lead_paragraph: Underscoring a power shift away from Europe, Uruguay fought — and apparently even bit — its way to a 1-0 victory over Italy Tuesday to move to the World Cup's next round with Costa Rica, which sent England home without a single victory after a goalless draw.

headline.main: Uruguay Beats Italy to Advance; Greece Late Winner
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Beats Italy to Advance; Greece Late Winner

docs.snippet: Uruguay forward Luis Suarez faces a lengthy ban after Italy defender Giorgio Chiellini accused him of biting during the South Americans' 1-0 Group D victory on Tuesday, overshadowing a day of emotional extremes at the World Cup.
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay forward Luis Suarez faces a lengthy ban after Italy defender Giorgio Chiellini accused him of biting during the South Americans' 1-0 Group D victory on Tuesday, overshadowing a day of emotional extremes at the World Cup.

headline.main: Suarez Bite Mars Uruguay Win, Greece Break Ivorian Hearts
headline.print_headline: Suarez Bite Mars Uruguay Win, Greece Break Ivorian Hearts

docs.snippet: The beach ball being thrown around the stand by bored, cheering fans captured just how serene Costa Rica's progress has been at the World Cup.
docs.lead_paragraph: The beach ball being thrown around the stand by bored, cheering fans captured just how serene Costa Rica's progress has been at the World Cup.

headline.main: Costa Rica Survives 'Group of Death' With Ease
headline.print_headline: Costa Rica Survives 'Group of Death' With Ease

docs.snippet: Colombia playmaker James Rodriguez set up Jackson Martinez for two goals and scored one himself as they thrashed Japan 4-1 to claim top spot in Group C on Tuesday and set up a mouthwatering second-round clash with Uruguay.
docs.lead_paragraph: Colombia playmaker James Rodriguez set up Jackson Martinez for two goals and scored one himself as they thrashed Japan 4-1 to claim top spot in Group C on Tuesday and set up a mouthwatering second-round clash with Uruguay.

headline.main: Colombia Crush Japan 4-1 to Set Up Uruguay Clash
headline.print_headline: Colombia Crush Japan 4-1 to Set Up Uruguay Clash

docs.snippet: After one final frustrating game in Brazil, England's players can finally fly home. The Motherland of Football's most humiliating experience at a World Cup is over, and the grieving process — as coach Roy Hodgson sees it — and the inquest...
docs.lead_paragraph: After one final frustrating game in Brazil, England's players can finally fly home. The Motherland of Football's most humiliating experience at a World Cup is over, and the grieving process — as coach Roy Hodgson sees it — and the inquest can continue in England.

headline.main: England Flies Home From World Cup Winless
headline.print_headline: England Flies Home From World Cup Winless

docs.snippet: Luis Suarez was embroiled in another biting controversy on Tuesday when the Uruguay striker appeared to sink his teeth into Italy defender Giorgio Chiellini's shoulder in a crucial World Cup group game.
docs.lead_paragraph: Luis Suarez was embroiled in another biting controversy on Tuesday when the Uruguay striker appeared to sink his teeth into Italy defender Giorgio Chiellini's shoulder in a crucial World Cup group game.
